definition[0]: a line of connecting pipes, often under the ground, used for sending gas, oil etc over long distances
definition[1]: a line of connecting pipes, often under the ground or sea, used for taking gas, oil etc over long distances
example[0]: a plan to build a 250-kilometer pipeline to supply the city with water
definition[2]: if a plan, idea, or event is in the pipeline, it is still being prepared, but it will happen or be completed soon
example[1]: The company has other distribution deals in the pipeline which will be announced over the next few weeks.
